channel.title: How do i add so it does a weapon attack...?
channel.description:
how do i make it so a skimmy hits like a skimmy on my server. on my server it just hit's real fast, and all the other items hit real fast too. how do i make it so it does the actual hit?
REP++ if you can help.

item.title: How do i add so it does a weapon attack...?
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

i didn’t find anything that looks like, or anything like that.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1333
{
return 406;
}

I am using a devolution source as base if that helps.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add so it does a weapon attack...?

item.title: How do i add so it does a weapon attack...?
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Search for something like playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####
replace the #### with a wep id…such as rune scimmy, 1333.
Then there should be a return code with a number, something like this…

return 1000;

That’s the emote, so if you wanted to add the rune scimitar emote, add this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1333) //rune scim
{
return 406;
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add so it does a weapon attack...?

item.title: How do i add so it does a weapon attack...?
item.dc:creator: @barragey0uXD barragey0uXD
item.description:
@barragey0uXD wrote:

Well if it hits too fast you can make the action time higher so it hits a bit slower.
Or if you looking for the scimitar animation you need to put in the right gfx.
